name: Dratini
fact: Dratini is known for its gentle nature and is often found in bodies of water where it can swim gracefully.

name: Dragonair
fact: Dragonair is known for its beauty and mystical aura, and it can control the weather with its powerful presence.

name: Dragonite
fact: Dragonite is known for its incredible strength and its ability to fly at extremely high speeds.

name: Salamence
fact: Salamence's massive wings and powerful breath make it a formidable opponent in battle.

name: Garchomp
fact: Garchomp's powerful jaws and sharp claws make it one of the most dangerous Dragon-type Pok√©mon.

name: Latias
fact: Latias is known for its ability to sense the emotions of others and its graceful flight.

name: Latios
fact: Latios can create and control powerful psychic waves, which it uses in battle and to protect its loved ones.

name: Dragapult
fact: Dragapult is known for its ability to launch Dreepy at high speeds as a method of attack.
